description: This trail goes up a prominent summit overlooking Saint-Brigitte-de-Laval. It is well maintained and marked all the way up. It is a loop and brings you along the ridge up the mountain, near a hang glider ramp, and then to lookouts giving you views of Québec to the south.Easy hike with snowshoes in the winter.
directions: From downtown Québec, take highway 73 north. Take exit right towards Ste-Anne-de-Beaupré onto highway 40.Take exit 320, towards rue Seigneuriale (north).Follow rue Seigneuriale.Take a right onto boulevard Louis-XIV.Take a left onto boulevard Raymond.Boulevard Raymond becomes avenue Sainte-Brigitte.Follow avenue Sainte-Brigitte.In Sainte-Brigitte-de-Laval, turn left on rue Auclair.Follow rue Auclair and take a left onto rue des Roches.Park at the end near trailhead sign.
title: Montagne Deux Têtes
